target_text: He is friendly, respectful, and supportive toward his peers. He's approachable and known for helping classmates, especially when it comes to studies or tech-related doubts. He values teamwork and builds strong connections with both friends and juniors.

input_text: Does he take notes during lectures?
target_text: He takes his academics seriously and stays consistent with his learning. He enjoys exploring subjects beyond the syllabus and puts effort into mastering core technical concepts. His focus on education shows in how he balances theory, practice, and project-based learning.
